I am a second-year PhD candidate in Economics and Public Policy, jointly offered by Heinz College of Information Systems and Public Policy and the Tepper School of Business at Carnegie Mellon University (CMU). I completed my Master’s degree in Economics at the Graduate School of Management and Economics (GSME) at Sharif University of Technology in Iran. I also hold a Bachelor of Science degree in Mechanical Engineering (with a minor in Economics) from the same university. My primary research interests are environmental economics, urban economics, and experimental economics.
